title: Birthday mini cupcakes
ingredients: ['125g natural yoghurt', '125ml vegetable oil', '450g plain flour', '1 teaspoon baking powder', '5 tablespoons caster sugar', '4 eggs', 'oil for greasing', 'Icing', '300g cream cheese', '180g icing sugar', 'a few drops of red, green and blue food colouring']
